title: Frequently Asked Questions
summary: Here are some frequently asked questions about my skills and experience as a software engineer. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact me.

faqs.question: What is your process for converting a Figma design to a responsive HTML website?
faqs.answer: My process for converting a Figma design to HTML starts with a detailed analysis of the design to identify reusable components and styles. I then write clean, semantic HTML and use SCSS to create a modular and maintainable stylesheet. I pay close attention to responsive design, ensuring the website looks great on all devices, from mobile phones to desktops.

faqs.question: How do you ensure the websites you build are compliant with accessibility standards (ADA)?
faqs.answer: I am committed to building accessible websites. I follow the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) and use tools to test for compliance. This includes using semantic HTML, providing alternative text for images, ensuring keyboard navigation, and maintaining a high color contrast.

faqs.question: What is your experience with email marketing tools like Mailchimp and Litmus?
faqs.answer: I have hands-on experience creating and testing responsive email templates for marketing campaigns. I use Litmus to test my templates across different email clients and devices, and I am familiar with Mailchimp for managing and sending email campaigns.

faqs.question: Can you explain your experience with React.js?
faqs.answer: I have experience building user interfaces with React.js. I can create reusable components, manage application state, and interact with APIs. I am also familiar with the broader React ecosystem, including tools like React Router for navigation.

faqs.question: What is your approach to website optimization and performance?
faqs.answer: I believe that a fast and optimized website is crucial for a good user experience. My approach to performance includes optimizing images, minifying CSS and JavaScript, and leveraging browser caching. I also focus on writing efficient code and avoiding unnecessary computations.

faqs.question: How do you collaborate with designers and other developers?
faqs.answer: I believe in clear and open communication. I work closely with designers to ensure that the final product is a pixel-perfect representation of their vision. I also collaborate with other developers through code reviews and version control (using Git and GitHub) to maintain a high-quality and consistent codebase.
